SEARCH
Package us.ullberg.startpunkt.service

Class KubernetesInformerService

java.lang.Object
us.ullberg.startpunkt.service.KubernetesInformerService
@ApplicationScoped public class KubernetesInformerService extends Object
Service that uses Kubernetes Informers to watch resources and maintain the application and bookmark caches.

Informers provide automatic reconnection, resync, and resource version management, eliminating the need for manual watch restart logic.

Informers are established for: - Application CRDs (startpunkt.ullberg.us) - Bookmark CRDs (startpunkt.ullberg.us and hajimari.io) - Ingress resources (if enabled) - Route resources (OpenShift, if enabled) - VirtualService resources (Istio, if enabled) - HTTPRoute resources (Gateway API, if enabled)
